ProductInfo.Features:
This Photo4Less Top Value Accessories Kit includes
Nikon D5300 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with Built-in Wi-Fi and GPS Body Only (Black)
EN-EL14 Lithium-Ion Battery Pack - EN-EL14 Battery Power Charger - Hi-Speed SD USB Card Reader - LCD Screen Protectors (Clear) - Table Top Tripod
Lens Cap Holder - Camera & Lens 5 Piece Cleaning Kit - Tri-fold Memory Card Wallet - Vivitar SLR/DSLR Pro Hand Camera Grip - Water Resistant Shock Proof Camcorder & SLR Camera Case
Nikon School DVD - Understanding Digital Photography - Photo 4 Less Camera and Lens Cleaning Cloth - Transcend 16GB Class 10 SDHC Card - Transcend 8 GB Class 10 SDHC Flash Memory Card
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5300 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with Built-in Wi-Fi and GPS Body Only + Spare Extra EN-EL14 Battery + Battery Power Charger 24GB Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle
